courses.title: NativeScript with Angular Getting Started Guide
courses.subtitle: A free course to get you started with NativeScript and Angular
courses.description: Welcome to the NativeScript Getting Started Guide. In this course you'll use NativeScript, a cross-platform JavaScript framework for building native mobile apps, to build an iOS and Android app from scratch. This course is the video version of the Groceries tutorial found on nativescript.org.

authors.name: Alex Ziskind
authors.bio: Alex lives in Washington, DC. He's a speaker, trainer, and a Telerik Developer Expert. He's been invloved in NativeScript projects since 2015 and has created courses for Pluralsight.
authors.title: Trainer and Owner

courses.title: NativeScript Core Getting Started Guide
courses.subtitle: A free course to get you started with NativeScript Core using TypeScript
courses.description: Welcome to the NativeScript Getting Started Guide. In this tutorial you'll use NativeScript, a cross-platform JavaScript framework for building native mobile apps, to build an iOS and Android app from scratch. You'll use just TypeScript and CSS in this course.

courses.title: NativeScript with Angular Web Application Conversion
courses.subtitle: Moving your web app to a native mobile app
courses.description: This course is specifically for those people that need to convert an existing web application to a native mobile application. We will do this using NativeScript with Angular.

courses.title: Securing NativeScript Applications
courses.subtitle: Making your NativeScript Applications Bulletproof
courses.description: In this course, we will learn how to deal with security in your NativeScript applications. We will look at both Core as well as Angular versions of the framework.

courses.title: Styling NativeScript Core Applications
courses.subtitle: Everything about CSS in NativeScript Core
courses.description: In this course, we will learn in depth styling techniques with NativeScript Core. We'll learn how to use global NativeScript styling constructs as well as how to best approach separation of styles into composable rules. We'll also look at using platform specific styling and using style preprocessors like LESS and SASS. Finally we will see how to defined CSS animations in NativeScript.

courses.title: Styling NativeScript with Angular Applications
courses.subtitle: Everything about CSS in NativeScript with Angular
courses.description: In this course, we will learn in depth styling techniques with NativeScript and Angular. We'll learn how to define styles for Angular components in NativeScript, as well as how to use global NativeScript styling constructs. We'll also look at using platform specific styling and using style preprocessors like LESS and SASS.
